title: Finding Jayda
description: What if you could escape by faking your own death? The room was turned upside down, blood everywhere. Jayda was murdered. At least that's the way it appears when detectives arrive on the murder scene. Only one problem, Jayda is missing and no body can be found. Tormented by her abusive boyfriend and desperate to escape her life, Jayda fakes her own death. Her escape works, but with unforeseen results... the police, and her deranged ex-boyfriend now hot on her trail. On the run, Jayda encounters several colorful characters that transform her view of life, and her expectations of happiness. She ends up in a small, quiet mountain town where she makes new friends. But someone in town wants her goneâ€”for good. The long-arm of the law, and one determined detective are slowly closing in. During her journey Jayda faces the fight of her life. Will love and happiness forever elude Jayda? Find out now in this romantic suspense novel that includes mystery, suspense, ancient myths and long-held secrets.
author: Samantha Johns
